news.Title: [AI Summary] 采鈺11月營收年減8.42%，近期股價呈現震盪
news.Content: • 采鈺11月合併營收為7.84億元，年減8.42% [1]。近期股價呈現震盪，本週漲跌幅為1.64%。, • 近期無其他重大營運消息。 【綜合分析】 參考來源：Yahoo奇摩股市: 1則 | 資料期間：2025-12-10 至 2025-12-10 | 新聞數量：1 則 采鈺（6789）於2025年12月10日發布公告，指出公司2025年11月份的合併營收為7.84億元，相較於去年同期呈現衰退，年減幅度達到8.42% [1]。此營收數據為近期市場關注的焦點之一，可能對公司股價表現產生影響。 從股價表現來看，采鈺的最新收盤價為279.00元（2026年1月2日），較前一日的285.00元下跌了2.11%。觀察近期股價波動，五日前（2025年12月24日）的收盤價為274.50元。整體而言，采鈺在過去一週的股價漲跌幅為1.64%，顯示股價在新聞發布後呈現一定的區間震盪。 儘管11月營收數據略顯疲弱，但市場仍需觀察後續營運狀況以及是否有其他利多消息出現，以判斷公司未來的發展潛力。目前除了11月營收公告外，並無其他重大的公司營運消息公布，投資人需持續關注采鈺的營收成長動能以及產業景氣變化。

news.Title: [AI Summary] VisEra November Revenue Decreases 8.42% YoY, Stock Price Shows Volatility
news.Content: • VisEra reported November consolidated revenue of NT$784 million, an 8.42% decrease year-on-year [1]. The stock price has recently been volatile, with a weekly change of 1.64%., • No other significant operational news recently. [Analysis] Sources: Yahoo Finance: 1 article | Period: 2025-12-10 to 2025-12-10 | Number of articles: 1 VisEra (6789) announced on December 10, 2025, that its consolidated revenue for November 2025 was NT$784 million, representing an 8.42% year-on-year decrease [1]. This revenue figure is one of the recent focal points for the market and may impact the company's stock performance. In terms of stock performance, VisEra's latest closing price was NT$279.00 on January 2, 2026, a 2.11% drop from the previous day's close of NT$285.00. Observing recent price fluctuations, the closing price five days prior (December 24, 2025) was NT$274.50. Overall, VisEra's stock price has fluctuated by 1.64% over the past week, indicating some range-bound trading following the news release. Despite the slight weakness in November's revenue figures, the market will need to monitor subsequent operational developments and any other positive news to assess the company's future growth potential. Currently, apart from the November revenue announcement, no other significant company operational news has been released. Investors need to continue paying attention to VisEra's revenue growth momentum and changes in industry sentiment.
